name: google-libphonenumber
description: The up-to-date and reliable Google's libphonenumber package for node.js.

scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator --no-issues --header-label='# Changelog' --future-release=v$npm_config_future_release --user ruimarinho --project google-libphonenumber && sed -i '' -e :a -e '$d;N;2,3ba' -e 'P;D' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run testonly
scripts.version: npm run changelog --future-release=$npm_package_version && npm run build && git add -A CHANGELOG.md dist
